Method.name: LoadAll
Method.Implementation: s sc=##class(GitHub.Loader).LoadAll(organization,login,password) if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("Commits") if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("CommitsByContributors") if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("Contributors") if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("HistoryClones") if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("HistoryContributors") if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("HistoryViews") if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("Repositories") q sc

Method.name: UpdateAll
Method.Implementation: s sc=##class(GitHub.Updater).UpdateAll(organization,login,password) if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("Commits") if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("CommitsByContributors") if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("Contributors") if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("HistoryClones") if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("HistoryContributors") if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("HistoryViews") if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("Repositories") q sc
